results.name: Continued fraction for Niven's constant.
link: I. Niven, Averages of Exponents in Factoring Integers, Proc. Amer. Math. Soc. 22, 356-360, 1969.
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Niven's Constant
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
mathematica: rd[n_] := rd[n] = RealDigits[ N[1 + Sum[1 - 1/Zeta[j], {j, 2, 2^n}], 105]][[1]]; rd[n = 4]; While[rd[n] =!= rd[n - 1], n++]; Niven = FromDigits[{rd[n], 1}]; ContinuedFraction[Niven, 100] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Oct 30 2012 *)
results.author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
